channel.title: Most Lag Free Server Development
channel.description:
Well I have WinterLoves Server.
It has just about nothing on it.. Its so Primative :P. The client.java is 2593 lines long atm. :eek: I plan to make a server with it, No crap = Less lag! this hopefully will be the most lagg free server.
What Im doing to make it Lag Free: :) - Deleting Global Objects with makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, -1, 0, 10) (makes object ID -1 deletes lagg free :).) - Adding Nothing I dont need too. - Making Voids and adding to case 121: rather than Boolean Proc.
Acomplishments: - Got Global objects Working. - Disabled mass My way, very simple. Check out Tut section.
Post anything I should add, Im going to add Full Specs. It will be a mission. its got shit all in it. Need to declair loads of stuff.
Post away.. (Suggestions & Support)

item.title: Most Lag Free Server Development
item.dc:creator: @Zero_Freeze ZeroFreeze
item.description:
@Zero_Freeze wrote:

Starting from wLs source is a bad choice, if you really want to accomplish what you said.

Read full topic

item.title: Most Lag Free Server Development
item.dc:creator: @_Nirvana † Nirvana †
item.description:
@_Nirvana wrote:

[quote=“Alpha X, post:9, topic:105783”]I suggest re-making the playerhandler, npchandler, objecthandler and the itemhandler.

PlayerHandler: Looks like a piece of crap atm.
NpcHandler: Well not necessarily re-write but remove chunks of code.
ObjectHandler: This needs to be patched up so people do not exploit.
Itemhandler: Same thing.

For me

Playerhandler - [Not done]
NpcHandler - [Not re-wrote but removed most of the lagg]
objecthandler - [patched]
itemhandler - [patched]

I recommend running your server in sql. It makes things alot more easier. Another thing: re-do threading: it creates a thread sends it to the playerhandler then the client.java. That is yuck.

The player class can help alot of with in-game content

What you could start with (Stuff that does not need patching up just pure good):

  • RSD (fasga’s old source, he made rscd into a rs2 source with alot of clienthandling stuff)
  • RSX (Another server by fasga based on rscd too.
  • RSCD (Possibly the best base now)
  • Avatar (Well I just like it)[/quote]

thanks for ur suggestion, will do.

Read full topic

item.title: Most Lag Free Server Development
item.dc:creator: @Alpha_X Alpha X
item.description:
@Alpha_X wrote:

It seems fasga has shifted into creating a server from scatch

Here is RSX:
http://jtorials.com/rs/rsx.tar.gz

I also need RSD i had it a few months ago only reformated computer and it was lost. Fasga seemed to have deleted it.

Ill upload the rest.

Read full topic

item.title: Most Lag Free Server Development
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Putting it in case 121, as I understand, makes it load when you connect to the server. In the case of objects, and other things depending on regions, areas where you are etc, it is useless.

EDIT: Now that I think about it, case 121 is used to make shit appear for everyone BUT the person logging in. Therefore pointless.

Read full topic

item.title: Most Lag Free Server Development
item.dc:creator: @_Nirvana † Nirvana †
item.description:
@_Nirvana wrote:

theres just about nothing in it, im making voids, then putting them in case 121: much more lag free

Read full topic

item.title: Most Lag Free Server Development
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Want a lag free server? Take all the CRAP out of process().

Might I add that this will become obsolete when the 458 server base comes out.

Read full topic
